original: 可以對該據點的附屬建物<color=#FFE9D6>開發</color>、<color=#FFE9D6>升級</color>、<color=#FFE9D6>拆除</color>，附屬建物的最大等級以及可建設數量受到<color=#FFE9D6>據點規模</color>影響。
text: <color=#FFE9D6>Development</color>, <color=#FFE9D6>Upgrade</color>, <color=#FFE9D6>Remove</color>, the maximum level of the attached building And the number of buildings that can be built is affected by <color=#FFE9D6>base size</color>.
